snippet: Thomas, an All-Pro free safety, played the Super Bowl with a torn labrum in his left shoulder and will need surgery in the off-season.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks safety Earl Thomas will need surgery for torn labrum in left shoulder; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Thomas, an All-Pro free safety, played the Super Bowl with a torn labrum in his left shoulder and will need surgery in the off-season.

headline.main: Seahawks’ Earl Thomas Will Need Surgery
